random(double, double) - Static method in class primitives.Util
Generates a random number within the specified range [min, max).
Ray - Class in primitives
Ray class represents a ray in 3D space, consisting of a starting point (p0) and a direction vector (dir).
Ray(Point, Vector) - Constructor for class primitives.Ray
Constructor for a ray given a starting point and a direction vector.
Ray(Point, Vector, Vector) - Constructor for class primitives.Ray
Constructor for a ray given a starting point, a direction vector, and a normal vector for the geometry.
RayTracerBase - Class in renderer
The abstract class RayTracerBase serves as the base class for ray tracing algorithms.
RayTracerBase(Scene) - Constructor for class renderer.RayTracerBase
Constructor for RayTracerBase.
RayTracerBasic - Class in renderer
The class RayTracerBasic extends RayTracerBase and is responsible for performing ray tracing calculations to render a 3D scene.
RayTracerBasic() - Constructor for class renderer.RayTracerBasic
default Constructor
RayTracerBasic(Scene) - Constructor for class renderer.RayTracerBasic
Constructor for RayTracerBasic
